place.name: SKEWEN
place.gazetteerText: SKEWEN, a chapelry in Cadoxton parish, Glamorgan; near Neath. It was constituted in 1846; and its Post town is Neath. Pop., 3,173. Houses, 640. The living is a p. curacy in the diocese of Llandaff. Value, £160. Patron, alternately the Crown and the Bishop. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
